llm.feedback: The draft lines miss the required “watch” signal and over‑state probabilities; replace each outcome clause with a concrete trigger (e.g., “watch September 5 payrolls and September 12 Fed meeting for robust job growth” for the Up case, “watch Q3 earnings releases and ARM‑payment metrics for a tech‑sector miss” for the Down case), collapse the two Up lines into one (Fed‑rate‑cut + resilient labor market) and the two Down lines into one (Fed‑rate‑cut + weak payrolls + tech earnings miss), and recalibrate probabilities to 55% for the Up scenario and 65% for the Down scenario, citing FAN5RYW6T, KX6AOMQZ5, and U21K4ALYQ where appropriate. Ensure each line follows the strict format: Up/Down | Sep 12 – Dec 2025 | <driver> | <watch signal> | <prob %>, with a single driver/mechanism and a single watch event, and add at least one inline citation per line.
